author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...JOYCE MOVING NORTHWESTWARD OVER THE OPEN ATLANTIC WITH NO CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
summary:
...JOYCE MOVING NORTHWESTWARD OVER THE OPEN ATLANTIC WITH NO CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
 As of 5:00 AM AST Sat Sep 28
 the center of Joyce was located near 19.5, -45.3
 with movement NW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Joyce (AT1/AL112024)
